parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of resources. The number of resource IDs ranges from 1 to 50.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Valid values: template execution

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag keys and values. The number of key-value pairs ranges from 1 to 20.
